title: Watch this easy make-up tutorial for Valentine's Day! - Times of India
text: LFW 2017: New mommy Bebo steps out, looks like a goddess in Anita Dongre's creation Watch this easy make-up tutorial for Valentine’s Day! Make-up artist and blogger, Naina Ruhail showcases the perfect party make-up just in time for the Valentine's Day! TNN | Updated: Feb 10, 2017, 04.44 PM IST There is no such thing as too much make-up and 14th February is simply another excuse to glam up your look. So, if you're looking to make your Valentine's Day extra special—we've got you a make-up tutorial just in time for the V-Day. And this look can be recreated in just 5 to 10 minutes. Make-up Artist and Blogger, Naina Ruhail shows you how to ace the party look with the perfect base, smokey lids and a sexy pucker. Her easy-peasy guide will surely inspire you to pick up your brushes and do your own make-up for the date night. Watch the video and get party ready this Valentine's Day 2017 Valentine's Day party make-up 04:24 Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
